attributes.action: prevent the closure of East Southsea Post Office
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: East Southsea Post Office is a vital element of the community, and has been serving locals and visitors for nearly 40 years. At a time when the country is suffering a breakdown of social cohesion, removing such a well-used and well-liked institution is counter-productive. It is more than just a business, and its loss cannot be calculated in financial terms alone.
